parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes item from soldier's uniform. Can be used with magazines and weapons too.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''removeItemFromUniform''' item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addItemToUniform]] [[removeItemFromVest]] [[removeItemFromBackpack]] [[removeItemFromPrimaryWeapon]]
</value></part></template>
